longInfo:
Passport required
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for the period of intended stay.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of Temporary Passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 56 days for nationals
of the Russian (Fed.).
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Passengers arriving within 6 days after leaving or transiting
countries with risk of yellow fever transmission For details, click here
and not holding a yellow fever vaccination certificate are
subject to vaccination upon arrival. 

Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
shortInfo: Есть возможность получить визу по прибытии в аэропорту Банжула для туристов, прибывающих чартерным рейсом или в составе организованных групп. В остальных случаях необходимо заранее подавать документы на визу. Возможен сухопутный безвизовый транзит через страну при следовании из северной части Сенегала в южную.
